description: This file defines Pydantic data models for ride-related API request and response schemas in a ride-sharing backend. It includes models for creating rides, assigning drivers, updating ride status, and viewing ride information, along with event tracking and list querying schemas.

classes.name: RideCreateRequest
classes.description: Schema for creating a new ride request, capturing origin and destination coordinates.

classes.name: RideAssignRequest
classes.description: Schema for assigning a driver to a ride via driver UUID.

classes.name: RideStatusUpdateRequest
classes.description: Schema for updating the status of a ride.

classes.name: RidePublic
classes.description: Schema representing the public view of a ride, including IDs, status, location, fare, and timestamps.

classes.name: RideEventPublic
classes.description: Schema for ride event logging, including event type, payload, and timestamps.

classes.name: RideHistoryResponse
classes.description: Response schema containing ride ID and list of associated events.

classes.name: RideListQuery
classes.description: Schema for querying a list of rides with filtering by role, status, and pagination.

ctags.name: RideAssignRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class RideAssignRequest(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: RideCreateRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class RideCreateRequest(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: RideEventPublic
ctags.pattern: /^class RideEventPublic(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: RideHistoryResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class RideHistoryResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: RideListQuery
ctags.pattern: /^class RideListQuery(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: RidePublic
ctags.pattern: /^class RidePublic(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: RideStatusUpdateRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class RideStatusUpdateRequest(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: created_at
ctags.pattern: /^    created_at: datetime = Field(..., description="When event was created.")$/

ctags.name: created_at
ctags.pattern: /^    created_at: datetime = Field(..., description="When the ride was created.")$/

ctags.name: dest_lat
ctags.pattern: /^    dest_lat: float = Field(..., description="Destination latitude.")$/

ctags.name: dest_lat
ctags.pattern: /^    dest_lat: float = Field(..., ge=-90, le=90, description="Destination latitude in degrees.")$/

ctags.name: dest_lng
ctags.pattern: /^    dest_lng: float = Field(..., description="Destination longitude.")$/

ctags.name: dest_lng
ctags.pattern: /^    dest_lng: float = Field(..., ge=-180, le=180, description="Destination longitude in degrees./

ctags.name: driver_id
ctags.pattern: /^    driver_id: Optional[UUID] = Field(default=None, description="Assigned driver user id (nullab/

ctags.name: driver_id
ctags.pattern: /^    driver_id: UUID = Field(..., description="Driver user id to assign to the ride.")$/

ctags.name: event_type
ctags.pattern: /^    event_type: str = Field(..., description="Event type string.")$/

ctags.name: events
ctags.pattern: /^    events: List[RideEventPublic] = Field(..., description="Ordered list of ride events (oldest /

ctags.name: fare_cents
ctags.pattern: /^    fare_cents: Optional[int] = Field(default=None, description="Final fare in cents (nullable)./

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: UUID = Field(..., description="Event id.")$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: UUID = Field(..., description="Ride id.")$/

ctags.name: limit
ctags.pattern: /^    limit: int = Field(default=50, ge=1, le=200, description="Max rides to return.")$/

ctags.name: offset
ctags.pattern: /^    offset: int = Field(default=0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination.")$/

ctags.name: origin_lat
ctags.pattern: /^    origin_lat: float = Field(..., description="Pickup latitude.")$/

ctags.name: origin_lat
ctags.pattern: /^    origin_lat: float = Field(..., ge=-90, le=90, description="Pickup latitude in degrees.")$/

ctags.name: origin_lng
ctags.pattern: /^    origin_lng: float = Field(..., description="Pickup longitude.")$/

ctags.name: origin_lng
ctags.pattern: /^    origin_lng: float = Field(..., ge=-180, le=180, description="Pickup longitude in degrees.")$/

ctags.name: payload
ctags.pattern: /^    payload: Dict[str, Any] = Field(default_factory=dict, description="Event payload JSON.")$/

ctags.name: ride_id
ctags.pattern: /^    ride_id: UUID = Field(..., description="Ride id.")$/

ctags.name: ride_id
ctags.pattern: /^    ride_id: UUID = Field(..., description="Ride id.")$/

ctags.name: rider_id
ctags.pattern: /^    rider_id: UUID = Field(..., description="Rider user id who booked the ride.")$/

ctags.name: role
ctags.pattern: /^    role: str = Field(..., pattern="^(rider|driver)$", description="List rides for current user /

ctags.name: status
ctags.pattern: /^    status: Optional[RideStatus] = Field(default=None, description="Optional status filter.")$/

ctags.name: status
ctags.pattern: /^    status: RideStatus = Field($/

ctags.name: status
ctags.pattern: /^    status: RideStatus = Field(..., description="Current ride status.")$/

ctags.name: updated_at
ctags.pattern: /^    updated_at: datetime = Field(..., description="When the ride was last updated.")$/
